alert.note: Alert for Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 10 at 8:19PM CST by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...AREAS OF FREEZING DRIZZLE TONIGHT... Observations and radar has shown areas of freezing drizzle and light snow continued this evening and that will continue overnight. In addition to the freezing drizzle will be areas of fog which will reduce the visibility in spots. A light glaze of ice will be possible from the freezing drizzle and slick conditions will be possible on area roads. Freezing drizzle may quickly coat roadways with a thin layer of ice that may be undetectable. Please use extreme caution... especially on bridges...overpasses and around curves. Allow plenty of stopping distance and avoid braking suddenly.

area.areaDesc: Northern Cook, Northern Lake; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
